plot: Dan Humford had an accident. Now he's in a coma, forever caught in the infinite white canvas of his own mind, where he's haunted by memories, personal insecurities, and sometimes candy bars, old girlfriends, and a fetus.
plot_en: Dan Humford had an accident. Now he's in a coma, forever caught in the infinite white canvas of his own mind, where he's haunted by memories, personal insecurities, and sometimes candy bars, old girlfriends, and a fetus.
plot_es: Dan Humford had an accident. Now he's in a coma, forever caught in the infinite white canvas of his own mind, where he's haunted by memories, personal insecurities, and sometimes candy bars, old girlfriends, and a fetus.
title: Coma, Period.
